com.aru

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aru.DBConnection

  • public class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by avenkat Connection class holds the singleton instance of the connection pool to be shared by application. Other classes may request a connection to the database form the shared pool.
